title: 20 mins low priority because of server crash on 03-13-2017
body: I have to wait 20 mins everytime i want to queue because of a game where 7 out of 10 players didn't connect when the servers were down. please remove that rito

replies.body: If this happened during the period of time where our servers specifically had issues on the evening of the 13th, then hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  I can't make any guarantees, but we want to get your feedback.  We'll see you there!
ok no1 help on this game?
